org.taptwo.android.widget
Class TitleFlowIndicator

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.widget.TextView
          org.taptwo.android.widget.TitleFlowIndicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, FlowIndicator, ViewFlow.ViewSwitchListener
public class TitleFlowIndicator
extends android.widget.TextView
implements FlowIndicator

A TitleFlowIndicator is a FlowIndicator which displays the title of left view (if exist), the title of the current select view (centered) and the title of the right view (if exist). When the user scrolls the ViewFlow then titles are also scrolled.
